text: Is it possible to invoke System Chaincode from User Chaincode using the InvokeChaincode() method provided by the shim?

In the chaincode samples (marbles or car lease), I see the methods use stub.GetState & PutState methods being used.  I can as well use a custom table and use InsertRow, GetRow methods, right?  That should not change the behaviour of of the smart contract.  Please correct me if I am wrong.  Thanks!
